title: Pawsibilities
description: Spearheaded the PetFinder API portion of this app with Javascript/ JQuery and Ajax in a team environment to create a pet application.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Created a user-search weather dashboard using Javascript/JQuery/ Ajax, the open weather and open UV APIs.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A color coded event-saving day planner created with javascript and JQuery.

title: Pixel Patch
description: A pumpkin stencil app where you can create your own stencils and print them out. Utilizes Express, Node, Jquery/Javascript, MySQL/sequelize, Ajax and some authentication dependencies.
